alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Craven; Jones; Onslow; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 4:07PM EDT until April 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... Southern Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 407 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Trent Woods to near Topsail Beach, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, James City, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Silverdale, Broad Creek, Janeiro, Great Neck and Riverdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
